pkgmetadata.longdescription: Workspaces with style! This program will dynamically rename your workspaces to indicate which programs are running in each workspace. It uses the i3 ipc protocol, which makes it compatible with sway and i3. By default, each program is mapped to a unicode character for concision. The short description of each program is configurable. In the absence of a config file, one will be generated automatically. See \${XDG_CONFIG_HOME}/workstyle/config.yml for details.
